description: Responsible for transforming the analysis results into various human-readable and machine-consumable formats, and for integrating CodeBoarding with external platforms like GitHub Actions and VS Code. It serves as the presentation and delivery layer for the generated insights.

components.name: Output Generation Orchestrator
components.description: Coordinates the generation of various output formats from the structured analysis results, delegating to specific format generators. It acts as the central hub for all output transformation processes within this layer.

components.name: GitHub Actions Integrator
components.description: Provides the necessary logic and entry points to execute CodeBoarding analysis within a GitHub Actions workflow, handling tasks such as repository cloning, triggering the analysis, and publishing the generated outputs.

components.name: VS Code Integrator
components.description: Manages the execution of CodeBoarding analysis and updates directly within the Visual Studio Code integrated development environment, allowing developers to perform on-demand analysis or update specific components.

components.name: HTML Report Generator
components.description: Transforms structured analysis data into interactive HTML documentation, including the integration of visual diagrams and detailed component information for a user-friendly web presentation.

components.name: Diagram Generation Service
components.description: Specializes in creating various visual diagrams (e.g., using Cytoscape data) from the analysis results, which are then provided to other generators for embedding into reports and documentation.

components.name: Markdown/MDX Generator
components.description: Converts the processed analysis results into Markdown and MDX formats, enabling the generation of documentation suitable for various platforms and static site generators.

components.name: reStructuredText (RST) Generator
components.description: Generates reStructuredText (RST) files from the analysis, specifically tailored for seamless integration with Sphinx documentation projects, allowing for comprehensive technical documentation.
